name: TimeDoors
description:
Hello

(Note that this is my Ludum Dare 47 game jam entry, the theme was 

"STUCK IN A LOOP" hope you enjoy my game)

so this game is basically a platformer but when u reach the level of choosing the doors but be careful because each door will lead u somewhere different muhahahahhahahaa.

anyways, hope you enjoy the game !

If browser laggy then pls download. Feedbacks and suggestions are most welcome :D

My ludum dare 47 page https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/timedoors
